reviews.review_msg: Michelle is an amazing professor. Very knowledgeable, strong facilitator and encouraging. She creates a safe, supportive learning culture. Her classes are very engaging, full of discussion, presentations and activities that really promote learning. If you have her as an instructor, you're very lucky!

Michelle's class was very innovative and also engaging. She's a very understanding prof (also usually laughing with the class) who makes it easier to come to class. Nothing bad to say about her, prob the best class and best prof I will ever take!!
Great class with lots of group discussion. Recommend taking it with Michelle.

I loved this class. Michelle creates the course with student input. Her assignments are interesting. I learned about the practical side of teaching which allowed me to reflect on the profession as a whole. Great class, totally recommend it with her.
